III.i.1.A.5.b
.
Adding a Copy of the Request to the Claims Folder
After the pay request is submitted, the
AskDFAS Military Pay Request Portal
will provide a confirmation page that contains a hyperlink to the records request, enabling a claims processor (with the passcode created during the submission process) to retrieve the requested records.
Using the web browser’s PRINT function, save the page as a portable document format (PDF), as opposed to using a screen capture or snipping tool to create a photo of the confirmation page.  This will maintain the hyperlink that can be used to quickly access the requested documents.
Important
:  Ensure the passcode is visible on the confirmation page that is uploaded to the electronic claims folder (eFolder).  If the passcode is not, identify the passcode using the annotation function in VBMS.
References
:  For more information on
determining the appropriate document indexing values when adding a copy to the eFolder, see the
AskDFAS User Guide
, and
bookmarks, annotations, and uploading documents to the eFolder, see the
VBMS Core User Guide
.
